casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alphonso SIMPSON. No. 592P01-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of April 2008 by Defendant through a post-conviction proceeding *858involving the error constitution United States:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2008."
